data.text:
Tom Cruise are an energetic person, never satisfied unless Tom Cruise are up and doing. Tom Cruise are strong in mind and strong in body and full of enthusiasm for the work in hand. Tom Cruise have unlimited courage, and all these qualities combined tend to make Tom Cruise's life varied. Tom Cruise are not going to stay at one thing just because Tom Cruise have set out in that direction. Tom Cruise will change Tom Cruise's job, Tom Cruise's friends, Tom Cruise's hobbies or anything whatsoever provided Tom Cruise think the change is for better. Unfortunately for Tom Cruise, Tom Cruise will not always count up the pros and cons of the change as carefully as Tom Cruise should and this impulsiveness may often lead Tom Cruise into difficulties. Still Tom Cruise have a courage, Tom Cruise are a born fighter and are endowed with plenty of enterprise. All of which will enable Tom Cruise to succeed in the end.It is unlikely that Tom Cruise will amass great wealth but money is only useful for the happiness it can bring and of happiness Tom Cruise will have Tom Cruise's full shape and more.There are many reasons for thinking that Tom Cruise will move from place to place a good deal and probably Tom Cruise will see much of the world. If a man, Tom Cruise are likely to take up posts in various parts of the country, and, if a woman, it would not be surprising if Tom Cruise called upon to travel because of the requirements of Tom Cruise's partner's business or profession.We would suggest that Tom Cruise should endeavor to cultivate the quality of patience, and that Tom Cruise reason out the cost more thoroughly before embarking upon some fresh enterprise. There are little points but they help to mar Tom Cruise's success. Moreover, avoid being a rolling stone (avoid changes) especially after the age of 35.

Tom Cruise are a person who live in fantasy. Hypersensitive, many of Tom Cruise have inferiority complexes, feeling slighted by taking the most unrelated incident as personal insult. It is important that Tom Cruise do not indulge in drugs or alcohol, for this adds to Tom Cruise's unclarity. Tom Cruise be honest with Tom Cruise'sself and others, and attempt to be as realistic as possible, for Tom Cruise tend toward escapism. Music, colours and nature are very positive in smoothing Tom Cruise's overly sensitive being.Tom Cruise are a sensible person by nature, which will also help Tom Cruise to handle various situations in life. Tom Cruise are likely to experience obstacles in Tom Cruise's studies but will face each and every situation without succumbing to fear. Tom Cruise's urge to acquire more and more knowledge will help Tom Cruise climb the ladder of success. In the initial phase of Tom Cruise's life, Tom Cruise may encounter certain difficulties, but Tom Cruise will prove to be lucky in Tom Cruise's studies solely because of Tom Cruise's concentration skills. Sometimes, Tom Cruise may find it difficult to remember certain things, but thinking hard during such time can make everything crystal clear. This aspect of Tom Cruise's character will help Tom Cruise to succeed in the realm of Tom Cruise's studies.
